channel.title: SFoL 3 - Upick Round 2 (Day 6) - 11/15
channel.description:
**Welcome to another game of Upick, where you, the players, get to make your own class by sending me and deadfrien (and also my co-host) a name, unique to you!**
**Rules:** 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Don't be a dick 3. Don't be inactive 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game
**Gameplay:** Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Cult will talk through a Discord Chat This is a Upick game, and so has special mechanics, each player, upon the game beginning, will PM me and deadfrien a name for their desired class, RNG will dictate which classes will be Blue Dragon and which will be Cult, and then I shall create them, this will take about 48 hours probably The classes will be more like in Mafia than ToL, meaning they will have 1 or 2 abilities maximum, also types will not be in play, just factions No Standard Classes shall exist When you receive your class card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it Balance isn't guaranteed
**Executions:** To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" There will be no trial, if you reach a majority vote, the voted player will die Executions end the Day After The Night You will be told what happened to you Night: Who knows what could happen? Day: Who knows what could happen?
**Journals:** There shall not be Journals
**To Join:** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want. After expressing you wish to join, provide me and deadfrien the name of your class via pms.
**Setup:**
**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=darkred]Cult [/color]** **[color=darkred]Cult [/color]** **[color=darkred]Cult [/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral[/color]**
**Players Alive:**
1. **JammySplodge** 2. **Hippolytus** 3. **Alfa** 4. **PolikShadowbliss** 5. **Frostwolf103** 6. **Bounty** 7. **NozBugz** 8. **eevee** 9. **Rogue** 10. **finnhorizon** 11. **Moleland**
**Graveyard:**
Wolf's Sanity OrangeandBlack5 - **[color=grey]Lynchproof Executioner [/color]** FadeBlade - **[color=stelblue]Alfa's heart [/color]** Damafaud - **[color=stelblue]Contract Devil [/color]** PokemonKidRyan - **[color=darkred]The Traitor[/color]**

#Seems like the public didn’t want to lynch anyone again

Night 6 begins and will end on the 11th at 11:00am BST

Don’t forget to send your actions and those that do not want to, please send a no action

Sleep well!

item.description:
Oh, Alfa/Fade lovers thing.

Alfa was never flipped. Only person who confirmed her to be town was a traitor and to add to that - it was before alignment swap.
After a swap Alfa claimed neutral and nothing about her goal or abilities.

That should be right if I’m right.
